543.question: how is mitigation of gender bias evaluated?
543.response: {'Answer': 'Mitigation of gender bias is evaluated by comparing various bias metrics such as bias scores (BN, B^Nc), gender ratio (GR), perplexity (Ppl.), occupation-conditioned bias (CB|o), gender-conditioned bias (CB|g), and endpoint bias (EB_d) across different models. The metrics indicate how well different methods reduce bias when generating text.'}
